title: Coastal Mercure Yokosuka Sanctuary
description:
Discover Tokyo’s scenic coastal outskirts and check in for stylish comfort at Mercure Yokosuka. Whether you’re travelling for business or leisure, Yokosuka’s rich cultural heritage and naval history are sure to captivate, and Mercure Yokosuka places you right in the centre of the story.

Situated in the eye-catching Bay Square Complex, home to the Yokosuka Arts Theatre, Mercure Yokosuka offers executive excellence and classic comfort just minutes from the city’s naval bases and the popular Honcho entertainment district. Wake with hearty breakfast at 19th-floor Le Bistrot de Bourgogne and soak up the sight of Yokosuka Bay to greet the day.
